itunes:title: Episode 336 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/30/18 - Special Guest Actor Clayne Crawford and Onnit Academy Instructor  Jeremy Hills
title: Episode 336 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/30/18 - Special Guest Actor Clayne Crawford and Onnit Academy Instructor  Jeremy Hills
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Baker Leavitt sit down with Onnit's Jeremy Hills to discuss the right way to exercise, eat, and train.  He discusses what it takes to get athletes ready for the NFL Combine.  Actor Clayne Crawford joins us to make his picks ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Baker Leavitt sit down with Onnit's Jeremy Hills to discuss the right way to exercise, eat, and train.  He discusses what it takes to get athletes ready for the NFL Combine.  Actor Clayne Crawford joins us to make his picks on this weekend's upcoming NFL and College Football games.
